com.github.fge.grappa.transform.process

Interface RuleMethodProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionClassGenerator, BodyWithSuperCallReplacer, CachingGenerator, GroupClassGenerator, ImplicitActionsConverter, InstructionGraphCreator, InstructionGroupCreator, InstructionGroupPreparer, LabellingGenerator, ReturnInstructionUnifier, RuleMethodRewriter, SuperCallRewriter, UnusedLabelsRemover, VarFramingGenerator, VarInitClassGenerator

    public interface RuleMethodProcessor
    An individual processor for altering a generated RuleMethod

    All processors defined make use of ASM to manipulate the byte code of generated methods. A given processor may, or may not, apply to a given rule. This depends on what annotations are used on the rule, whether it takes arguments, etc etc.
